Package org.wmn4j.representation.geometric

Class PointSet<T extends Point<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.representation.geometric.PointSet<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the point type to use in for the point set
    public final class PointSet<T extends Point<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Point set representation of a score. The points are sorted lexicographically in the point set.

    This class is immutable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PointSet<Point2D> from​(Selection selection)
      Returns a 2 dimensional point set (with double components) created for the given selection.
      static PointSet<Point2D> from​(Score score)
      Returns a 2 dimensional point set (with double components) created for the given score.
      T get​(int index)
      Returns the point in the given index.
      java.util.Optional<PatternPosition> getPosition​(PointPattern<T> pattern, T translator)
      Returns the position of the translated pattern in the score (see PatternPosition) if all points in the point pattern are present in this point set.
      java.util.Optional<Position> getPosition​(T point)
      Returns the score position (see Position) of the point in the score if the point exists in the point set.

      Returns the number of points in the point set.

      • getPosition

        public java.util.Optional<Position> getPosition​(T point)
        Returns the score position (see Position) of the point in the score if the point exists in the point set. Otherwise, returns empty.
        Parameters:
        point - the point for which the position ois returned if it's present
        Returns:
        the score position if the point exists in the point set

      • getPosition

        public java.util.Optional<PatternPosition> getPosition​(PointPattern<T> pattern,
                                                       T translator)
        Returns the position of the translated pattern in the score (see PatternPosition) if all points in the point pattern are present in this point set. Otherwise, returns empty.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the point pattern for which the pattern position is returned
        translator - a translator by which the points are translated
        Returns:
        the position of the translated pattern in the score if present, otherwise, empty
